website_summaries.verdict: A lip gloss with a soft plumping effect and coconut oil and vitamin E for conditioning. Comes in four shimmering nudes.
pros: This plumping lip gloss has a moisturizing, non-sticky feel on the lips
It works on its own or over lipstick
The range has great colors with good staying power
Plumping action has more of a cooling sensation than a tingle
cons: The plumping is less noticeable than with some other drugstore plumpers

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love all the ELF Plumping Gloss colors. But Mocha just does something for you soul Hunty!!! Long lasting, don’t have to reapply every five mins
customer_reviews.author: DeAndria D.

customer_reviews.title: Elf is as good as products from plastic surgeons product.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how well this product worked when compared to another popular pumping product that was $45 dollars that I had from a plastic surgeons office. I was very pleased with the elf product.
customer_reviews.author: GIA685

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pout
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Does fill out lip lines for fuller pout. Slight tingle but not so uncomfortable. Be realistic it wont work miracles but works as expected. I took off 1 star for longevity as I do have to reapply often but that's too be expected with a gloss. Also I would like it to be more pigmented but overall I reach for this lip gloss constantly. It's a good but for the price. Will buy again & also looking to purchase more shares.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn beauty

customer_reviews.title: Great tingling quality, smell, and quantity for price!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and was expecting only one tube(I must not have read the description&&the price seemed correct for one) to my surprise it came with 4 tubes!! Decent sized individual tubes too! Smells wonderful, feels good going on, after a minute there is an oddly satisfying tingle. Definitely plumps. Packaging was neat! Comes in a box of 4 and they come ready to be hung up or stored! Very happy with my purchase☺️
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Blunk

customer_reviews.title: PRETTIEST LIPGLOSS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I am a lipgloss fanatic...I have tried tons of them. This one is by far the BEST. I always seem to love the ones that are marketed for plumping. My old favorite was the NYX Lip Plumper in Angelina or Lindsay (but it was discontinued). This one is GORGEOUS! It's hard to describe the glass-like, non sticky gloss effect this has, it is a holy grail , my dream color of baby pink that looks so incredibly smooth. There is a nice, slight plumping that comes with it also.
customer_reviews.author: Roshamas

customer_reviews.title: silky texture, cool tingly plumping sensation, will buy again VERY HAPPY 😊🦄
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews of ppl saying that it burned their lips, on the flip side others saying it didn't plump at all! I'm VERY satisfied with my purchase, my hubby took IMMEDIATE notice saying "OH WOW! YEA they're plumper; especially ur top lip! Pretty!" I will buy this again especially at the amazing price point
customer_reviews.author: John Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine
customer_reviews.text: This didn't plump my lips, but is a great lip gloss. It felt really good and stayed put longer than any of my pricier gloss.
customer_reviews.author: btchboyer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and texture. I love that it's not sticky like most lip gloss. Awesome price too
customer_reviews.author: ashley farmer

customer_reviews.title: NOT for me!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. I ordered the shades Mocha Twist and Sparkling Rose. Was super excited for these elf plumping lip glosses but as soon as I put one on(Sparkling Rose) my lips felt like they were on fire! I have sensitive lips so it made the feeling even worse. The color looked lovely but I couldn’t keep it on the lips much longer or I would probably had ended up with burned lips. I don’t recommend for sensitive skin. Reason why I give it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Yudi E.

customer_reviews.title: good quality product at low cost. fulfills its function, moisturizes and plumps to perfection.
customer_reviews.text: Tested on 59-year-old woman. Results: good texture, slight tingling sensation, moisturizes for much longer than other more expensive lip glosses. Fills in the fine lines of the lips giving a much fuller feeling. Very nice color that can be used as the only product or combined with another. Happy to be able to purchase a good quality product for this price.
customer_reviews.author: EVER DANIEL CHAPARRO ALONSO

customer_reviews.title: Did not work and left my lipped with a chapped/burned spot
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me at all,I didn’t notice any difference however the color was great so I continued to wear it until I noticed my lips becoming almost chapped like. I had to stop using it now I have 3 brown/burned spots on my lips I’m hoping it peels off soon. I would not recommend very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: graciela g.

customer_reviews.title: It stings
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize was a lip plumper when I bought it. Every lip plumper I have tried, just stings my lips. Not a fan. Dont like lip plumper. But for you out there that does, it glides on smoothly and has a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Simplyme

customer_reviews.title: Great shine
customer_reviews.text: Can feel the tingle. Pumps a bit as it should. Pumping gloss is not a replacement for filler, lol. But I line this brand. Great value for a plumping gloss. Nice sheer and thick gloss. Will come off as regular gloss that is not made for long last will do. Recommend if you are looking for some extra fullness and shine. Will need to reapply every few hours if you are drinking frequently.
customer_reviews.author: DT.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love loooove!!! 💕
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this GLOSS!!! the shade is absolutely perfect!!! It’s a perfect nude gloss, goes great with my favourite matte lipstick by L’Oréal, It’s 822 mon caramel les macrons. It’s super sweet smelling and does a great amount of tingle to plump you’re lips, since it is a plumping gloss, I WILL be buying this again! Love you elf!!! (I got mocha twist)
customer_reviews.author: Blair’s Corner 🌹

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lip-gloss
customer_reviews.text: Typically, I purchase 4-5 at a time maybe at walmart or target. The lip-gloss is the best, my lips are always so full, and the color is so pigmented, however this one seemed to appear a little off. Still like it tho! Good If color isn't the main reason for purchasing.. the level of thickness, and imposture it gives is awesome.. ohh not too thick either
customer_reviews.author: IG habitsofdiamond

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Does not plump my lips at all... not at all satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Kelli galvis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pout
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best deal in plumping glosses on the market! Just enough tingle.. not sure how much ‘plumping’ it actually does, but it feels like it’s working! The consistency is not too thick or thin, perfect color payoff.. not sheer, but not like a liquid lipstick, either. Faint to no smell, not sticky, minimal bleeding. Fair skinned brunette here, I bought Sparkling Rosé (creme).. perfect ‘your lips, but better’ shade! I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend! It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical, but it does work! I feel tingling in my lips after application, but gently, as if I had applied menthol, nothing bothersome. My lips look ticker and plumped up. I am ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Elf never lets me down, I love the subtle scent, cute tiny, & quality. It is very good! Doesn’t tingle TOO much either like some other plumpers. Just right
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, last long with a little sting at first!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gloss for texture and longevity. It’s also a little sticky/which I like. It does have a sting and a slight burn after application. It can be a bit irritating but does not last very long. I’ll recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lip gloss with no plump effect.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't plump but it's a nice glossy lip sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Good product especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the better ones. You can't beat the price and I LOVE the color. It looks so good on any lipstick/color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and covers lip stick nicely
customer_reviews.text: Plumps the lips and brings out the outer line. Definitely can notice a bit more "plump" and "wow" stuff. Makes lips look pretty. The color is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Parent

customer_reviews.title: Brown skin girls dream neutral lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thick non sticky lip gloss! I am the shade cappuccino in the Revlon foundation. It’s very pretty on my skin tone. It also doesn’t come off as pink but rather a hint of pink. Very pretty for a neutral makeup look.
customer_reviews.author: Shanice

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, transparent, lightly glittered gloss. It is thick and sticky enough to stay on for a while, but not too sticky. The color is a nice flattering neutral pink, great for any skin tone. I'm not impressed with the plumping part, but I ordered 2 more colors anyway. I like this stuff, especially since the price is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Erik DeSart

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite lip glosses
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite lip glosses and it's so nice that it's offered online right now when I'm trying to avoid shopping in stores
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This looks good on, but my lips feel dry after using it so I will not be reach for it often. It also does not last very long on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie H

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t plump
customer_reviews.text: I love how it feels and it doesn’t wear off easily. It doesn’t plump your lips that much which I kind of expected but I love elf products in general so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting and super shiny
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a search for the perfect plumping gloss forever. While I don't necessarily agree with the plumping claim, I really love the glossy shine and the longevity of this gloss. It feels a bit tingly on the lips, which is fine, and the flavor is in between a vanilla and a mint. I'm on about tube #7 because I use it so much. I can't argue with the price, either. It's a perfect pink for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: T Verandes

customer_reviews.title: My lip gloss is poppin
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! It doesn't really tingle like some of the other lip plumpers I use. For the price point and brand, I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: jazzmin

customer_reviews.title: My lips felt like they were on fire
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the pink cosmo. Hardly added any color and my lips felt like they were on fire. Had to remove immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E

customer_reviews.title: Just a lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Just a lip gloss. Does nothing. It also has an ingredient that makes me sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great color.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very complimentary color. I also love the thickness of this gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Thegirlandthewaters

customer_reviews.title: great for summer natural look
customer_reviews.text: not too sticky works right away looks natural not exaggeratedly puffy does require frequent application
customer_reviews.author: vur

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produt!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! The price is outstanding.... Thanks e.l.f for making a wonderful lip product. 5 STARS*****
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it looks on!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I feel like I go through a bottle quite fast on the flip side.
customer_reviews.author: Anika Estioko

customer_reviews.title: The BEST (AFFORDABLE) Plumping Gloss!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Gorgeous shade and shine. Very mild and pleasant scent. Texture is not overly greasy. Plumping formula works gently and quickly. Excellent value, even before all of the discounts/coupon codes that were available for it. Extremely satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenna

customer_reviews.title: Pouty and full look
customer_reviews.text: Elf’s products are always so incredible for me. This has been one of my favorite products so far. I would almost compare it to the Buxom lip plumper gloss. It made my lips look significantly bigger and pouty. I will say it does burn slightly, but the effect is insane. Definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it. Not as plump as I would like but works good
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Weese

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: The price is amazing. Perfect gloss. So beautiful and plumps night. Alittle sticky but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: The color is funky. I need to remember not to buy makeup on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: emeghan

customer_reviews.title: Elf plump gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it actually plump your lip and moisturize! Feels good and I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Price

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color & plumper
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but it is sticky on your lips
customer_reviews.author: Smhbx

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the stuff it’s the only thing I wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it’s worth ordering, doesn’t seem any better than drugstore gloss. I didn’t see any plumping...will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Elf line. Couldn't find it anywhere, but Amazon to the rescue!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawndust

customer_reviews.title: Okay lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Nice, not too sticky. Not very long lasting. Pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Ellisa Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Last pretty long, picture taken of me after an hour after first applying it.
customer_reviews.author: BLou

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Elf lip plumper gloss. I would buy it over and over again. 3rd one i have purchased but first time purchasing this item through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloss and slight tint
customer_reviews.text: Not much color payoff by itself but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Does plump your lips and you can use it with or without lipstick. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome color. Does plump your lips and you can use it with or without lipstick. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sami Stone

customer_reviews.title: Add lipliner
customer_reviews.text: I love the glossy and glittery look! It’s so nice on my lips
customer_reviews.author: Jaylin F.

customer_reviews.title: Color as described and shown.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. Like color but a little thick.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lechlitner

customer_reviews.title: Elf Plumping Gloss
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product did exactly what it was supposed to. The gloss was has a perfect pinkish tint to it. The plumbing effect was not to drastic and lasted all day.
customer_reviews.author: michael michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for moisture not so much for plumping
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see much plumping which is the reason for my purchase but it was great for moisture
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft sexy plump look. This product provides that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More like a clear lip gloss no color to it
customer_reviews.text: It's more of a clear I thought it would have more of a color to it but it does not
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no plump
customer_reviews.text: Pretty gloss, and I will wear it, but I see no plumping effect at all. Still happy for the price as it does feel nice when on.
customer_reviews.author: renee draper

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and texture
customer_reviews.text: Not sticky!! lovely color and there is a little tingle, but not much plumping
customer_reviews.author: pikasmooch

customer_reviews.title: Not a lip plumper
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. It’s a nice gloss it just not a good lip plumper.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: I like this lip gloss a lot. It does what it is supposed to and im glad i bought it
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great worth five stars just what I was looking for . Could have been slightly more pink pigmented but still shows great
customer_reviews.author: Kbett77

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Bottle different. Wand is different. Product feels different. I’ve bought this hundreds of times from Walmart and this isn’t the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Globby
customer_reviews.text: It was gooey and difficult to control the amount with the applicator. I'll try it with a liner and lipbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: It is Beautiful, plumps your lips n all the colors are amazing Moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Mary S Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: The best gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss. It is my favorite and I want every color
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Marceau

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s last a long time and its a beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I love this lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss. The color, the ease and what a great price! A new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L Moore

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product.slight tingle but great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jabalera

customer_reviews.title: Bad item
customer_reviews.text: Is not good this don’t do the right work,is to bad just burn the lips
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product is beautiful however broke and leaked after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the package came empty
customer_reviews.text: the package came empty i didnt get the lip gloss
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lip gloss broke after a couple of days using it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Chartrand

customer_reviews.title: Only comes with 1 tube, not 4.
customer_reviews.text: I read in one review how they got 4 tubes in the mail, this listing in reality only comes with 1. I don't know why the other person received 4 tubes? This gloss is so dainty and cute, it is a soft pink color, I ordered the pink cosmo tone. It does make your lips tingle, it IS a plumper after all. It doesn't hurt, it feels like you have eaten something spicy and the sauce got on your lips. Even though I only got one tube I still really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Duckie

customer_reviews.title: Left me with irritated, cracked lips for days!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I mean, the color is gorgeous, and there's no doubt that it gives a nice shine. Unfortunately, whatever they use for plumping is SUPER irritating to the lips! I only used it twice over 4 days ago and my lips are STILL all cracked and irritated. I've had to apply every lip repair balm under the sun to try to calm my lips, but they still haven't healed yet. Be careful, Ladies, because this one is ouchy.
customer_reviews.author: Scano The Mano

customer_reviews.title: Tingly...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lip plumper as it had good reviews online - affordable, little lift from activating ingredients. I like it so far. The color of the gloss is nice almost natural. I don't see a huge difference or feel from this product compared to a more expensive. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: ANEL RAHBARI

customer_reviews.title: No Longevity / It Tingles
customer_reviews.text: The product is cute, but it will not last long once you apply it, especially after you eat or drink something. Also, it has a very odd tingling sensation for a few seconds after you use it. I do not believe it’s worth the money to have popin lips for 10-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Neika

customer_reviews.title: Pretty. Tingle sensation but didn’t see difference in lip size
customer_reviews.text: This product has the tingly/heat sensation you get use to in high value plumpest but I really didn’t see a difference. It’s got that thick/tacky feel of gloss. But to be honest I have real think/barely there lips to begin with so probably not a lot it can do. Also I’m 40 so my lips are not as acceptable to plumping as they once were
customer_reviews.author: Misty Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: Works fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss! You can feel it working by making your lips tingle! A great purchase for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Well... How to put this...
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing the pink cosmo. It doesn't stay very long. There is a mild tingle. It looks like ejaculate with a few drops of pepto bismol added for color. There is no plumping effect. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the sheer color of this. It definitely burns when you put it on, but I think that’s the plumping. I didn’t really notice any plumping, but the color is nice
customer_reviews.author: Lula

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloss-nice pigment, not too sticky!
customer_reviews.text: So the reviewers are correct! This is a nice little gloss! Not too sticky, a decent amount of pigment...and a really nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Collins

customer_reviews.title: Creamy texture
customer_reviews.text: Warming sensation began after a few minutes. Product performed well for plumping. Needed to reapply after a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kenji's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great color and price. Must reapply often.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Fills like lip plumper for less time than others. Color doesn’t last very long. Approximately 30min each application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new lip gloss! It's not too sticky and it stays on well. I'll order it again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Nice milky pinky/peach shade, doesn't settle into lines on my lips,slight tingle,you need this shade.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini Johnson

customer_reviews.title: More like a regular lipgloss-not a plumping one.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping to find a cheaper option to a plumping gloss I do love but this one does not give my lips that plump tingly feeling unfortunately :(
customer_reviews.author: Elysia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what they claim
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lip gloss but don't be fooled. It DOES NOT PLUMP YOUR LIPS! ELF should definitely not make that claim. It's false. 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: DSC

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It seems tingley and actually did plump a bit , also made my lips hydrated and i am 56 :)
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: Nice 4 price
customer_reviews.text: Left my lips moisturized not Hard and chapped. Saw a pout on lips.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: A sheet, glossy tingle
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, looks great, prickly so plumping possible, lipgloss so isn’t as long a lasting as I prefer, but then....it’s lipgloss
customer_reviews.author: Holly J.

customer_reviews.title: No plumping.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok as far as the shade. No plumping whatsoever though😒
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't plump
customer_reviews.text: Does not plump at all but worth the money as a lipgloss.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Really like this brand
customer_reviews.text: Good combination between just a gloss and a regular lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: MCS1968

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the color...but it doesn’t plump my lips as much as I thought it would...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fav gloss
customer_reviews.text: My FAV, it’s crazy the price went up right after I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels well.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and feel of this gloss. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Gloss not a plumper
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is NOT a lip plumper but a gloss moisturerizer
customer_reviews.author: 7dazzle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss. Doesn't plump very much but still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about elf lip plump! Fair price works very well, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley baxter

product_meta.title: e.l.f, Lip Plumping Gloss, Hydrating, Nourishing, Invigorating, High-Shine, Plumps, Volumizes, Cools, Soothes, Pink Cosmo, Shimmer, 0.09 Oz
product_meta.description: Color:Pink CosmoThe Lip Lacquer is your secret weapon to a flawless face. This moisturizing formula gives off great shine without being greasy or tacky. Wear alone or top your favorite lip color for a bold look. So even on days when you go light on makeup with just setting powder and foundation, your smile will looks its best. Shine on! e.l.f. makes the best of beauty accessible to every eye, lip, and face. Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique. From the early explorer to the trend-obsessed beauty junkie—glam or bare faced, minimalist, maximalist and every look in between—we are for every eye, lip, and face. Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide.
feature_bullets: PLUMPER POUT: A nourishing liquid formula that delivers high shine while helping plump lips. With a burst of color and a subtle shimmer, this moisturizing gloss is enriched with vitamin E and coconut oil so your lips will feel soft and supple.
HOW TO WEAR: Apply directly to lips as often as you like. Wear alone or over your favorite lipstick and liner for a customized look.
100% CRUELTY-FREE & VEGAN: Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide. Because kindness is chic.
FREE FROM: All e.l.f. products are 100% free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol, ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban, and hydroquinone.
BEAUTY FOR ALL: e.l.f. Cosmetics provides professional-quality products at get-real prices, because we believe beauty should be accessible to every eye, lip, and face.
